title: Tianchu Miaoxiang Vegetarian-Tsinghua
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Chinese, Fast food, Take-out
description: Founded in 2003 and operates another outlet in Chaowai(CBD). This location is near east gate of Tsinghua University, Hai Dian District. Offers extensive vegetarian menu including a variety of mockmeat dishes. Organizes monthly free vegetarian cooking training salon.
